subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Last season, Giants offensive coordinator John Hufnagel chose plays from the sideline and Kevin Gilbride, the quarterbacks coach, listened from a booth above the field.  This season, the roles are reversed.
snippet: Last season, Giants offensive coordinator John Hufnagel chose plays from the sideline and Kevin Gilbride, the quarterbacks coach, listened from a booth above the field.  This season, the roles are reversed.
